item.description:
BOSTON JEWISH FILM FESTIVAL
TC: Heather hrport@hotmail.com
EVENT: View the Israeli film Souvenirs, a ?funny, unpredictable and unforgettable film? about a father and son?s trip, tracing the father?s WWII path through Europe. For more information about the film, go to http://www.bjff.org/f.... The screening will be at the new Institute of Contemporary Art, a treat in itself, and then we?ll proceed to a local caf√© for a light dinner and to discuss the film.
RSVP: Recommended. Participants are responsible for purchasing their own tickets and are encouraged to purchase them EARLY, as films sometimes sell out. See the BJFF website for ordering options: http://www.bjff.org/f...
MEET: 2:30 p.m. at the ICA so the group can get seats together. 100 Northern Avenue, Boston. For directions to the ICA, see http://www.icaboston....
COST: Film $10 + money for dinner and $5 non-member fee.

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Boston Jewish Film Festival
